In this game, you travel around the Kanto region, battling at every location you visit. As in the cartridge game, your Pokémon will gain experience through battle and learn new attacks. By completing a level in adventure mode, you will earn Andro Coins. These coins can be exchanged for items in the store. You can also try to win rare items or Pokémon that cannot be found in the wild thanks to the various mystery gift summoning banners. You will unlock new banners as you progress through the adventure.
After a fight, you should heal your Pokémon. Do not hesitate to redo certain levels to collect lots of healing items.
This is a route with wild Pokémons! In these levels, you can use Pokéballs to catch them and you will be able to use them in battles.

In this game, your Pokémon level are capped. At the moment, your level cap is 20. Each time that you defeat a gym leader, he will give you a badge that will increase your current level cap. To know your current level cap, check your trainer card.
In this route, there are many trainers that are looking for a battle. You have to fight all of them in succession.
In some places, you will encounter a very powerful wild Pokémon. Defeating it will require more than just using strong moves.
Now that you have cross the Victory Road, you can challenge the Elite Four. Once you have entered the league, you won\'t be able to change Pokémons in your team.

Congratulations, you have become the Pokémon League Champion but your adventure is not over. There are still places to visit in the Kanto Region. You can also re-battle each gym leader. In the trainer card menu, there are many achievements that you can reach to win rewards.
New items are available in Poké Mart!
Would you like to play in hard mode?

In hard mode, resources like in-game currency and items will be harder to get. Only TMs will be accessible via mystery gift. This means that you will not be able to get some Pokémons and specific kinds of Poké Ball (including Hyper Balls) in hard mode. WARNING: This cannot be changed throughout the game.
